Activity

Decide the problems solved by implementing VLANs.

Select the scenarios where VLANs help to solve the problem stated.

1. <textformat blockindent='14'>Users in the warehouse are accessing records in the payroll department. Management has asked you to isolate the payroll department from the rest of the network.</textformat>

2.<textformat blockindent='14'> Staff in the sales department continually join the network and then leave. This causes quite a bit of broadcast traffic as machines try to discover each other. These broadcasts slow down network performance in the graphics department.</textformat>

3. <textformat blockindent='14'>During the execution of a large project, members of the Marketing, Sales and Public relations departments collaborate on different parts of the project. The Network administrator is concerned about response time on the collaboration server.</textformat>
4. <textformat blockindent='14'>The company plans on installing a VoIP system but worries that voice traffic will be unusable due to the large amount of data on the network.</textformat>
You have identified the scenarios where VLANs solve the issues stated. Click Next to continue.
